showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ a flying J dealer. Not an actual flying J. Your app will work to fuel, but you will have to go inside to book a shower. If you have to wait, there is a drivers lounge that has some pretty comfortable seating. Showers are very roomy, unlike ‚Ä¶

They are always rude. Waiting for a shower for 55 minutes, the stuff just doesn‚Äôt care about it. All the showers are empty, and no one cleans them. They said we don't have clean towels - I told them that I have my own, answer: showers are ‚Ä¶

They don‚Äôt want give you shower very stupid place truckers don‚Äôt stop here. Don‚Äôt get diesel. Rude cashiers. Pilot app says nine shower available. The cashier told me we have no available shovel right now because they don‚Äôt wanna clean up ‚Ä¶

Extremely poor communication between the employees (ended up waiting way too long for a shower when I apparently didnt need to, because the guy that sold me the shower never told the other guy I was already in line for one). Showers have ‚Ä¶

I did not like the fact that these two guys lied to two of us waiting for shower. They keep telling us it won't take long and we've been waiting about 3 hours then at midnight I saw them clocked out and said they're going home.

CLEAN HOT SHOWER I JUST WISH THERE WAS A FAN IN THE SHOWERS WITH ALL THE HOT WATER IT TURNS INTO A SAUNA WHILE YOUR TRYING TO GET DRESSED YOUR SWEATING AS FAST AS YOU DRY OFF BUT I CAN'T REALLY COMPLAIN SHOWER IS DEFINITELY WORTH IT,  THEY ‚Ä¶

One of the greatest truck stop in the area. Town pump shows to Pilot corporation how associates and management makes the difference. Clean, hot showers, big variety of food, big parking lot with smiley faces! ‚Ä¶

Plenty of truck parking. Every time I stop here it seems clean and well managed. Recliners in the spacious lounge, generously oversized shower rooms, and decent service as always. Plus, there are restaurants across the street.
Update August 2023 : the lady who was rude was not there . Everyone was very nice , accommodating.  The showers were clean . Glad to have a pleasant experience with friendly workers ‚Ä¶
For $10 or shower flying J can certainly afford soap that works, an exhaust fan and these toilet seat covers are useless! everybody knows that! come on step up the game
The staff is nice but the showers are $18 and take a long time to be ready. I would not recommend stopping here for a quick shower.
Used the showers. Clean and fully equipped with towels and soaps. Nice to have a warm shower when you need it. Wait time was minimal and staff was friendly!
‚Ä¶ Later I needed help getting a shower from the kiosk. My phone number wasn't registering. ‚Ä¶

Customer service was Nice but also interesting.  The showers were clean but there is only 4 showers. I arrived and paid for a shower was told to wait. I waited in my car for about 20 minutes since the driver lounge was busy Go inside ‚Ä¶

Absolutely avoiding in future.
Wait time for shower is hour and half

Terrible service. Hot water in showers doesn‚Äôt work. Hot water cuts out after five minutes and I got hosed down with cold water 3 times in 2 different showers on a frigid January day. Despite being made completely aware of the problem all ‚Ä¶

The people were really friendly in the store and also in the cafe. The food is awesome and the shower was clean and the water temp never varied. It stayed nice and hot. Overall I think this TA is pretty great!

Shower was discusting . No hot water.
Then i tried the restaurant. What a horrible experience. Cook should be working as a mechanic. Spaguetti was old and chicken undercooked. Will never go back.

Don't waste your money..Apparently professional truck drivers are low on the list of priorities here...you will get charged extra for WARM water to do laundry and if you want a hot shower your out of luck. Thier own employees said they ‚Ä¶

No service shop. Low flo shower heads, took long time to get hot, was clean tho. Soda/Ice fountain out of order. Needs maintenance in the mens bathrooms. Food in restaurant wasn't the best. Wide parking spots were nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ place is fantastic overall. It's an old-school truck stop and operated like one. I didn't see any photos of the showers, so I uploaded some. Quiet (not right next to a highway/freeway), so easy to sleep in the lot. Well-lit, but not overly ‚Ä¶

Absolutely fantastic little place! I walk in expecting to pay for a shower and she says nope truck drivers shower free! I said what? She say we sure do appreciate our truck drivers and this is one way to say thank you!

Stopped here after Teddy Roosevelt to shower and refill.  Showers were full sized bathrooms and very clean.  Water was hot and pressured.  Restaurant was very good, parking lot held many local cars; always a good sign when locals dine in. ‚Ä¶

Great one stop shop! Eat, snacks, gamble, shower, laundry, rest, vacuum out vehicle, you name it!
Staff is always helpful & friendly.
One of our favorite stops!

Very hot water in shower
Very friendly folks
Prices reasonable for a truckstop
Nice place free shower for truck drivers clean restrooms
Very nice and hot shower

showerReviews.reviewText: Half if the showers are empty. Staff is too lazy to clean them. I know this because I am and have been standing here at the beginging of the shower halways for 45 minutes. Seen people walk out from showers and staff not cleaning them. Dont ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ me feel right at home. I took a shower there, and it had been a real busy day for them, he told me they had sold 200 showers by the time I took mine, but that didn't interfere with his excellent service and the cleanliness of the shower üëç. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on 6.25.2024 for letting me stay in the parking lot. I felt very safe sleeping overnight in my car at this location. I also appreciate the hot shower. Returned on 7.22.2025 for gasoline that lasted until Wheatland, Wyoming... 352 Miles

Usually pretty clean place but the shower also has hair all over it. Parking is busy at night the usual loves smaller parking lots. Usually a favorite place to stop but definitely disappointed in cleanliness of my shower today.

Nice Love's excellent shower rooms. And who doesn't love Hardee's.
Nice area.

Worst Loves ever. And I do mean EVER. Rude snotty cashier, open showers with 5 people in line but she thought chatting it up with a Co worker guy at the shower door was better than cleaning. 15 mins later I said something, her response was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to stop here and check it out.  Place is very clean and well kept,  shower was spotless,  even the parking lot is trash free, and the employees I spoke to were friendly and professional.  Loves if you read these reviews all your ‚Ä¶

Kind of messy and unorganized. Tried to get a shower because I was passing through and the folks working werent cleaning ANYTHING. Just telling everyone that the showers were occupied. Which definitely wasnt the case. I was standing by the ‚Ä¶

Very nice, clean RV area.  Reasonable price because it includes your shower.  Shower was very clean.  The only reason I give it a 4 is because there is a stray German Shepherd that runs around (so sad) and I was walking my dog and had to ‚Ä¶

This was an excellent spot as we were passing through the area.  The washroom/shower facilities area is just pristine.  So beautiful and clean.  They also have a fenced in area for dogs and some sports courts. The RV sites are excellent ‚Ä¶
Hard to get signed in. No email for showers. Other folks helped us and clerk at store gave us shower code. No online chat option No one to talk to.

For 52.00 just for electricity and no snow removal at all..ice everywhere with no salt or sand..
1st time very disappointing..
No shower codes, no toilet paper in showers, mess all over the floor..

showerReviews.reviewText: Excellent. This is a slightly older place, but very well maintained. Shower was roomy. Everything was clean. Staff were friendly.  The attached restaurant is a sandwich-shop/deli; short menu and quick service. Easily as nice as the Love‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

I would like to give this establishment one star.  I'll explain why.  I chose a gas station along the way with the calculation of a low price and a free shower.  Stopped at this gas station.  I ate $650 and wanted to take a shower, to which ‚Ä¶

Bought fuel here with the intention of getting a shower, cashier (Coby) said he didn't have any clean showers and would have one soon so I went and had breakfast while waiting for a shower. Get done with breakfast and went to try and get a ‚Ä¶
very clean and employees working hard. shower was very nice and clean. appreciate the great service
Always  fuel there both ways weekly and Always  shower in #8 almost  my second  home
Good stop they have better vacancy if your traveling not a trucker. Just wanted a shower cuz I wasn't stopping till I got home!
I enjoyed the time to be get a shower and rest they have God's wisdom in hiring the help they have I didn't mean a bad one
Nice big twin head tile shower. Plenty of hot water. Good staff!
Nice towels with the holes in the shower you can see through
Great place to stop, friendly staff. Have lots of parking , shower,

‚Ä¶ not recommend you stay here over night. My wife and I tried to get a shower tonight, and were told that they were all booked due to a lack of appropriate cleaning staff readily available. As we were checking out with some merchandise, ‚Ä¶

Tried to get a shower and was told that it would be a thirty minute wait because they didn‚Äôt have time to clean the shower. Went back at 10:30 pm (an hour later) and was told that they were backed up on laundry so they still couldn‚Äôt clean ‚Ä¶
Good spot to rest, gas, food, etc.. The shower is nice and clean. Has McDonald's and a Casino. RV dump and water.

Truck drivers beware of your pilot points. There is an older gentleman that will use your pilot points  for your shower instead of your shower credits. Management (Victoria) does not seem to care or understand. Felt like I was talking to a ‚Ä¶
Swing staff would NOT refund my $ & told me to leave because when I pointed out the shower I just paid for was NOT cleaned & there was still shit in the toilet!

Very nice, newly remodeled. The shower was very nice except the shower head could be better. The staff is very friendly but when I asked at the fuel desk about showers, the young lady told me she was changing shift so I said I'd go get in ‚Ä¶

Terrible Service. Highly Unprofessional staff. I purchase a shower at least once a week there for at least 2 years. Because of my last experience I will never go there again. I started my shower, It was going ok, I noticed the water ‚Ä¶

Shower room was dirty I mean come on man.... there was hair on the floor and wall in the shower  and it looked like some one ate fried chicken while sitting on the toilet there were food crumbs right under the toilet paper dispenser. Plus ‚Ä¶
Store is well stock even though there is some construction going on. Fast service at the counter was nice. On the flip side shower heads were poor quality.

‚Ä¶ in Montana are.  If you are a trucker and you are a husband wife team.  You must ask for a team shower if you want towels for both of you.  The cleark at the counter refused to give us an extra towel and wash clothe.  Just yelled at us ‚Ä¶

Struggle. The showers have been down for 6 weeks. Not much sense in wasting your money buying fuel any place you can't get a shower. Guy spends $5000 a week in fuel and has to spend another $500 to get a shower from someone else.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ reminds us of the simple joys life offers. Here, a 17-minute shower isn't just about cleanliness; it's a rejuvenation of spirit, a testament to the care invested in the smallest details. The steam, the dual shower heads, the perfect ‚Ä¶

Billy was lazy guy.. at night and midnight time work just one side gas station.. (not trucker side) and everything DOWN end of the month.. no points, no shower.. just confuses people with one front desk clerk.. from 2 workers.. HORRIBLE ‚Ä¶
Very clean shower and employees friendly.  I am a female passenger of a truck driver so clean showers is a MUST.

‚Ä¶ my receipt at me. I don't know what I did to offend her, but she needs some serious help or she needs to move on. The employees working in Hardee's were lovely though. As were the other employees I encountered. Shower was clean as well.

Just stopped to get a shower and a bite to eat. Hardee's is a total joke! Stood in line to order. Worthless employees stood in back talking, while looking at me, while one of them was drinking an energy drink. I raised my hands while ‚Ä¶

This place is so BAD ! I ordered a shower and once I was in I come to find out there‚Äôs no hot water. I go asked and they said that it doesn‚Äôt work they shut off the boilers for 3 of their showers and they are still giving them to people‚Ä¶. ‚Ä¶

It was a good sunny day, because I was bored, I decided to go after a shower to the casino and play a little, after I won a couple of hundred in your casino I was accused of stealing the phone of some people I don‚Äôt understand, a phone that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ part the part should have been taken care of before the software update. After going to the town pump no showers and now the loves I give up on Missoula all together. Be better off paying for a hotel room to shower and do laundry before ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ $2.489. A decent amount of parking spaces, and ALL spaces are equally easy to back into because of the wide open lot. The shower rooms are like something out of Hollywood, brand new, fancy, and clean. The staff, decent! Especially the one ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is the same as many other LOVES in the country so no problem their, but I do have a major issue when the water in the shower is coming out in a dribble so you can barely rinse you hair (mind you I'm bald) out and you can only tell the "hot ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I get what I want. I can fill up my truck I park take a shower do my laundry. The only complain about the shower that water pressure is bullshit. It's OK I'm gonna fix that one by one. Take off the showerhead drill a bigger hole on it ‚Ä¶

Not bad. Clean. There is a place to park the truck. The shower rooms and laundry are on the second floor of a nearby building ‚Äì the entrance is through a casino. Important!: you need coins to wash - you can take them from the main building.

‚Ä¶ the restaurant. At the end of the day truck drivers want three things. Fuel, a hot meal, and a shower. Showers are commonly closed, fuel pumps are often down or not working properly, hot food is limited when it‚Äôs there. However I will ‚Ä¶

Bought fuel had truck service done.  Tried to get a shower.  They took my shower credit.  I go to fuel desk I'm told all showers are dirty no problem I'll wait for a shower.  Was told they can't do that.  Drivers spend shit pots of money at ‚Ä¶

My husband was there tonight and purposely fueled here (even though it was 12 cents higher per gallon of diesel) so that he could shower after fueling. He went inside and paid for his fuel and asked for shower and was given this long excuse ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ one day if you are having work done on your truck locally but there are trucks and dropped trailers behind the shop, shower are not working, staff is rude and uncaring, food is terrible. this place is steadily getting worse, avoid it if ‚Ä¶

No showers! Wish I would‚Äôve known that before I wasted my time getting fuel and walking in there and then punching it in on the kiosk only to find out it took my shower. But the lady says their showers are down just like all the other TA‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

Truck stop in decline.  Fuel pumps broke, shower room doors dragging the floor.  Paint blistering & peeling in the shower.  Restaurant ‚Äúpermanently closed.‚Äù  Last one out, please turn off the lights.  üòü ‚Ä¶
This is the worst TA I‚Äôve ever encountered. There‚Äôs no food, no shower, and the restroom is extremely dirty.

‚Ä¶ I stood at the hot bar for 10 minutes and not one of the 6 employees would do anything. I stopped to get fuel and a shower and they are all shut down so they can clean them. All of them at the same time come on this is happening to much.
Tons of parking, shop, store, food, casino, shower, laundry, lounge.

It's all a joke here now they used to be the best, now they don't have a restaurant and they have no one that will even take care of the hot bar or the showers. They wait till they are all dirty then they close the them down to clean them ‚Ä¶

I came here last night sept 29 and nothing has changed here.. still same small low ceiling showers but clean and hot so ok with me being 6.3ft tall Dutch but that it gonna cost 18 bucks ... to steep for a shower in my opinion. ‚Ä¶
Lot of parking. Casino, Shower, Beer, Food everything is here under one roof. Friendly and polite staff.
Cashier  was to busy talking to other people while I waited in line the guy that cleaned the shower did a terrible job!!
No excuse, could not shower due to short of staffs.
Waiting for cleaning shower >1hr. They don't have stuff.

‚Ä¶ I wasn‚Äôt treated fairly and was wildly accused of going to be a driver that takes a shower while leaving my semi on the fuel aisle out of nowhere. I thought that was very odd. The white cashier dude was extremely rude not knowing me and ‚Ä¶
